uptitle: Mazda shares the same passion to keep these much-loved
title: The restoration scheme takes in much-loved classics and returns
content: Bentwaters Parks, 19 August 2008. 11:52. Time for one last shot. The Mazda Furai growls threateningly on the runway. No trailer-queen concept car, this is a living, fire-breathing breath of fresh air. Under its carbon-fibre bodywork lurks an LMP2 Courage chassis and a 460bhp rotary race engine. Running pure ethanol. The Furai is very noisy. It is very fast. And right now, Top Gear is the only magazine in the world to have driven it. It will remain so.
lead: Time for one last shot. The Mazda Furai growls threateningly on the runway
